project.name: Gore Bay SJHC Long-Term Care
project.area_source: Extracted from A1.01 Gross Building Area Schedule — 48,039 SF Level 1 + 3,851 SF Mezzanine = 51,890 SF

lines.description: Temporary facilities — trailers, power, water, fencing, hoarding
Concrete elevated slabs, 6 inch, 4000 psi on metal deck
Formwork, plywood, walls and columns, 4 use
Concrete foundations, strip and pad footings, 3000 psi
Concrete slab on grade, 4 inch, 3500 psi, w/ w.w.f.
Concrete columns and shear walls, formed and placed
Reinforcing steel, A615 grade 60, detailed and placed
Brick veneer cladding, standard modular, with ties and mortar
CMU backup wall, 8 inch, reinforced, grouted
Structural steel, beams and girders, nursing home
Miscellaneous metals — stairs, railings, lintels, embeds
Metal deck, composite, 2" deep, 20 ga galvanized
Metal wall panels, insulated, prefinished steel
Flashing, galvanized steel, counter and through-wall
Air barrier and vapour retarder, self-adhered membrane
Wall insulation, fiberglass batt, 6 inch, R-20
Door hardware set, commercial, lever lockset and closer
Wood door, solid core, 3-0 x 7-0, with frame
Hollow metal door and frame, 3-0 x 7-0, 90 min fire rated
Aluminum entrance door, 3-0 x 7-0, with closer
Interior partitions, GWB on steel studs, taped and finished
Painting, walls and ceilings, latex, 2 coats + primer
Acoustic ceiling tiles, 2x4, tegular, suspended grid
Resilient flooring, sheet vinyl, commercial grade
Ceramic tile, floors and walls, thin-set, institutional
Sprinkler piping, steel, 1" to 4", with hangers
Sprinkler heads, pendant, quick response, standard coverage
Water closet, floor mounted, two piece
Medical gas system — O2, vacuum, medical air
Domestic water piping, copper type L, insulated
Plumbing waste and vent piping, cast iron/PVC
Hydronic heating piping, copper, insulated, various sizes
VAV terminal units with reheat coils and tubing
Duct insulation, fiberglass blanket wrap, 1.5 inch
Make up air unit, gas fired
Electrical distribution, switchgear and bus duct
Branch circuit wiring, 12 AWG THHN in 3/4" EMT
Fire alarm system, addressable, panels and devices
Security system, access control and CCTV
Site grading, fine grading, topsoil placement
Excavation, bulk, machine, footings and foundations
Asphalt paving, parking lot, 3 inch, complete
Water main, ductile iron, 8 inch, complete

hanscomb.note: Hanscomb Class A — scaled to 51,890 SF
